From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Deep under the ocean, peaceful fish swam by, totally unbothered by the
goliath like creature which dragged an even larger thing behind him.
Abominus kept at his manual task, with little else to do, until he
finally was stopped by a rock wall he backed into. He stopped, his hands
ungripping, letting the huge ship creak on it's own weight as it toppled
over without his support. He turned his head and looked upwards, to the
top of the cliff, not quite sure what to do now. Then he remembered the
words, (Pull it in that direction.) Astrotrain had told him. 

"Through....wall..." he bellowed, turning towards the cliff wall. 

He raised his huge fists, and gurgled a growl, as the large cannon on
his chest lit up, the energy wave digging into the rock wall, destroying
it. As it dug into it a ways, he stopped, and slowly moved into the
small crack he had created. He put one hand on each side, and then
strained for a moment, until the walls began to implode, crumbling
against his might. With the obstacle gone, he moved back towards the
ship, hands gripping into the frame anew. He then leaned back, and
continued to drag the ship, into the Gulf of Mexico.
